full_sentence: Asians mostly get the short end of the stick--when was the last time you heard a politician talk about Asians and how our votes count? We don't mean much to them unless there is a specific agenda that's being pushed. Otherwise, we're just a needle in a haystack.

topics.sentence_slice: politician talk about... our votes count

full_sentence: White supremacists say that blacks are dumb, inferior, violent and criminals and they believe that if the Jews didn't exist to fool everyone into desegregation all those problems would go away. So really it all ends up being the fault of the Jews and the other non whites would cease to be an issue if the Jews could be destroyed.

full_sentence: So my friend said "yeah jaxn I'm such a good sibling unlike you" and 20 seconds later he called his younger brother (4) a faggot and a cunt and called his sister (2) nigga like this boy is finally getting the grips of what the alt right been saying all along.
